channel.title: [PI]Getting a winxp run and changing server ip help!
channel.description: Can anyone teach me how to make a windows xp run and how to change the server ip of project insanity. I've tried searching through the files and looking for an ip change, but im having some trouble. Also, im on windows xp, and the only PI server that i know of that has a winxp run is overloadx. Help?

item.title: [PI]Getting a winxp run and changing server ip help!
item.dc:creator: @thock321 thock321
item.description:
@thock321 wrote:

winxp run as in making the client run on windows xp

Read full topic
item.source: [PI]Getting a winxp run and changing server ip help!

item.title: [PI]Getting a winxp run and changing server ip help!
item.dc:creator: @yo_dude_1345 yo dude 1345
item.description:
@yo_dude_1345 wrote:

what do you mean by windows xp run. Anyways that run he made for you should work and all you should have to do is change the java versions that are allocated with the current computer your trying to run the source/server on. 127.0.0.1 and 0.0.0.0 are the same thing there the localhost and yes “localhost” can be used for it aswell.

Read full topic
item.source: [PI]Getting a winxp run and changing server ip help!

item.title: [PI]Getting a winxp run and changing server ip help!
item.dc:creator: @Vexillum Vexillum
item.description:
@Vexillum wrote:

thock321:

I tried using the nividia source, and when i run the run.exe itll say “Server listening on port nividia.zapto.org:43594”

This doesn’t matter… As long as your no-ip is on no matter what it says the ip on server is it will always be your ip.

Read full topic

thock321:

thanks a lot for the server start run, but i need a windows xp run for the client too. Oh and i changed the ip for the client, but what about the server?

Don’t change anything in server related to the IP.

item.title: [PI]Getting a winxp run and changing server ip help!
item.dc:creator: @voetbal645 voetbal645
item.description:
@voetbal645 wrote:

Maybe this will help?

@echo off title Project Insanity java -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server start Run-Server.bat exit

and go to client.java (client sided)
and search for

just change the ip or if there are “” just add ur ip like “IP ADRESS”

Read full topic
